Reviews.Title: “Tintoretto experience”
Reviews.Author: Silsden
Reviews.Content: hotel location 15 mins walk bustrain station staff pleasant hotel clean teacoffee facilities breakfast usual continental style plenty choice own breakfast restaurant pizza location wise fairly central left rialto bridge st marks square train station water buses etcyou walk round easily safely pair walking shoes tended walk water buses apart taking plenty restaurants nearby prices meal venice watch service cover charge

Reviews.Title: “poor service and poor room”
Reviews.Author: richard1967a
Reviews.Content: staff didnt basic poor air conditioning tea coffee facillities shower looked clean breakfast meant guests shared dozens pigeons left guests shoo staff

Reviews.Title: “Don't ever stay at this hotel--terrible!”
Reviews.Author: smartpeopletravel
Reviews.Content: worst hotel stayed dont stay staff shady dishonest arrived hotel emailed quote 50 euro night checked rate 150 euro night hotel pull crap arrested holding passport leave country paid called visa filed complaint checking guidebook listed rate 50 euro night hotel isnt nice worth 150 euros nightthere hotels venice europe dozens times stayed dozens hundreds hotels bunch shady operators

Reviews.Title: “Good location, very clean!”
Reviews.Author: sinyurita
Reviews.Content: hotel close train station walk steamer 1 easier walk 10 minutes nuevo strada starting venice grocery store street eat front simple breakfast hot coffee unlimited refills service walk elevators pack light venice finished remodeling clean remember elevator

Reviews.Title: “For 40 euros a night”
Reviews.Author: BuieKnife
Reviews.Content: due season friend prides bargaining hotel visited venice january 40 eurosnight breakfast price fine service nonexistent day didnt care single cute wooden wardrobe view marble statue makers yard alley location convenient shops food stores quiet night

Reviews.Title: “Unreliable and sneaky”
Reviews.Author: Lillian-Melbourne
Reviews.Content: booked hotel month advance meticulously sifting hotels similar price range decided due tripadvisor reviews price location arrived hotel midnight extremely difficult despite printing route google maps hand desk saying shower broken water continued saying friend hotel road staying instead statement request obviously proof true feeling overbooked simply decided move convenience handwritten list guests associated floor flooded noticed name hotel allocated morning talk manager night watchman friend appeared door told hotel female solo traveller idea following complete stranger deserted streets unknown city dead night didnt particularly appeal didnt choice hotel adequate paid advance hotel definately wasnt worth returned morning complain manager 2 days venice particularly eager waste half morning arguing hotel staff nor spending rest morning moving hotels result actually provide review service leave positive impression reccommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “Average at best.”
Reviews.Author: toronto85
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel july 2010 reviewers mentioned little tricky tucked main street obvious benefit lack street noise location decent close grocery store restaurants nice little strip stores cafes particularly nice weird plastic floors uncomfortable beds bathroom clean toilet kept flushing awhile management fix difficult hotel workers speak english upstairs jiggle flush button times stop flushing weird water pressure terrible handle shower broken shower curtain chained pulled walls thin close stairs sleep earplugs night fine airconditioned tv channels breakfast consisted coffee croissants fresh yogurt cereal yogurt milk left sitting heat didnt eat croissants fine overall recommend hotel amazing deal perfectly acceptable
